name: Roric Wyrmbane
aura: Increase Ally SPD in in all Battles by 19

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 40% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Each hit will fill this Champion’s Turn Meter by 15% if the target is not under a [Stun] debuff after the hit.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of decreasing the target's Turn Meter by 75%. If this skill fully depletes the target's Turn Meter, also has an 80% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff on all other enemies for 1 turn.

Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore 50% of the target’s DEF.

This Skill will not be blocked by [Block Active Skills] debuffs.
